title: David Simon | Trump Contradicts Experts as Coronavirus Is Declared a Pandemic: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump contradicting public health officials about the severity of the global coronavirus pandemic.

Then, David Simon discusses the prescient nature of The Plot Against America, meeting Philip Roth and Charles Lindbergh’s anti-Semitism.

He also takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G exclusively for this podcast.
